actions.text: Referred to House Committee on the Judiciary.

official_title: Joint resolution restoring citizenship posthumously to Gen. Robert E. Lee.

summary.text: Restores citizenship posthumously to General Robert E. Lee. Provides that, in accordance with the United States Constitution, the legal disabilities placed upon General Lee as a result of his service as General of the Army of Northern Virginia are removed and that General R. E. Lee is posthumously restored to the full rights of citizenship, effective June 13, 1865.

titles.title: Joint resolution restoring citizenship posthumously to Gen. Robert E. Lee.
